title: (x) DIN-like "go forward" - Telenor {Marten}
content:
I have inherited this font from a client who doesn't know what it is. Can anyone please help.

Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120118201701im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Sample_5413.jpg)
author: tonymcguigan

comments.content:
If your client isn't Telenor then you may not be authorized to use this font. Here are some alternatives:  
 [CP Company](http://web.archive.org/web/20120118201701/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/schiavi_design/cp_company/)  
 [FF DIN](http://web.archive.org/web/20120118201701/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_din_ot/)  
 [Scene](http://web.archive.org/web/20120118201701/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/monotype/scene/)  
 [Pill Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20120118201701/http:/www.veer.com/partner/link.aspx?i=1048&c=4&p=products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000043)  
 [Metroflex](http://web.archive.org/web/20120118201701/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/garagefonts/metroflex_uni/)  
 [TV Nord 1](http://web.archive.org/web/20120118201701/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/elsner_flake/tv_nord_1/) and [2](http://web.archive.org/web/20120118201701/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/elsner_flake/tv_nord_2/)

I'm frustrated by the sheer beauty and coolness of this face, but moreso by its unavailability. The closest alts I could find are Section and Apex New from [Village](http://web.archive.org/web/20120118201701/http:/vllg.com/).

I hope this thread doesn't die just because it's been correctly ID'd (Telenor). If a legitimately available doppelganger exists, I hope someone can direct us! Good luck...

<cite>If a legitimately available doppelganger exists, I hope someone can direct us!</cite>

Huh? Haven’t you seen Stewf’s post? I doubt you can get any closer legitimately …

Inspired by newfound familiarity with Parachute's offerings, may I suggest PF Din Display?

[http://www.parachute.gr/fonts.aspx?Sample=1&FontStyleID=&FontFamilyID=14...](http://web.archive.org/web/20120118201701/http:/www.parachute.gr/fonts.aspx?Sample=1&FontStyleID=&FontFamilyID=14&CharacterSetID=34 "http://www.parachute.gr/fonts.aspx?Sample=1&FontStyleID=&FontFamilyID=14&CharacterSetID=34")
